Description: Brake Repair Marketplace - Instant Brake Repair Quotes
Full Description: BrakeQuotes.com is an online marketplace linking vehicle owners with repair shops and dealerships who provide brake repair services.  Our site allows vehicle owners to get instant competitive quotes & instantly schedule service at a time & location of their choice using the site's scheduling system. Our proprietary self-service pricing tool allows repair shops & dealerships to easily pre-populate all their pricing information, so that quotes can be instantly provided to consumers shopping for the best deals on brake repair services.     Vehicle owners can purchase pre-paid service vouchers for less than they can pay for brake service at local repair shops.  Once the service voucher is purchased vehicle owners simply schedule a service appointment and redeem the voucher at the repair shop or dealership they selected. Members accumulate rewards points allowing them to redeem them for cash payouts and/or future vehicle repair services from any repair shop or dealership in our vast network.

Description: Brandywine Realty Trust is a self-administered and self-managed REIT
Full Description: Brandywine Realty Trust is a self-administered and self-managed REIT, which provides leasing, property management, development, redevelopment, acquisition and other tenant-related services for a portfolio of office, mixed-use and industrial properties. As of December 31, 2012, the Company owned 221 properties, consisting of 193 office properties, 19 industrial facilities, five mixed-use properties, two redevelopment properties and two re-entitlement properties (the Properties) containing an aggregate of approximately 25.1 million net rentable square feet. As of December 31, 2012, it owned economic interests in 19 unconsolidated real estate ventures that contain approximately 7.0 million net rentable square feet. It owns its assets and conducts its operations through the Operating Partnership and subsidiaries of the Operating Partnership. It is the sole general partner of the Operating Partnership and, as of December 31, 2012, owned a 98.1% interest in the Operating Partnership.

Categories: Home Services, Property Management, Real Estate, Rental Property, Sales
Description: The British Land Company is one of the largest property development and investment companies in the United Kingdom
Full Description: The British Land Company is one of the largest property development and investment companies. Our portfolio of high quality UK commercial property is focused on London Offices and Retail around the UK. We own or manage a portfolio valued at £16.2bn (British Land share: £12.3bn) as at 31 March 2019 making us one of Europe’s largest listed real estate investment companies. Our strategy is to provide places which meet the needs of our customers and respond to changing lifestyles - Places People Prefer. We do this by creating great environments both inside and outside our buildings and use our scale and placemaking skills to enhance and enliven them. This expands their appeal to a broader range of occupiers, creating enduring demand and driving sustainable, long term performance. Our Offices portfolio comprises three office-led campuses in central London as well as high quality standalone buildings and accounts for 51% of our portfolio. Our Retail portfolio is focused on Regional and Local multi-let centres, and accounts for 45% of our portfolio. Increasingly our focus is on providing a mix of uses and this is most evident at Canada Water, our 53 acre redevelopment opportunity where we have plans to create a new neighbourhood for London. Sustainability is embedded throughout our business. Our places, which are designed to meet high sustainability standards, become part of local communities, provide opportunities for skills development and employment and promote wellbeing. Description: Cloud-Based All-In-One Educational Platform.
Full Description: BrainCert's all-in-one educational platform is very light, modern, responsive, and super easy-to-use platform that is designed to deliver any time of training online. This cloud-based SaaS white-label solution is tailored for organizations to run their own custom branded learning, and teaching platform with real time tracking of training results. LMS can be easily customized with your own logo, theme, colors, users, domain, and SSL certificate mapping. All the 4 core building blocks of the BrainCert Platform comes integrated in both E-Learning Platform and Enterprise LMS product offerings. Enterprise LMS allows organizations to easily on-board, engage, collaborate, and retain their customers with role-based access control and granular permissions. In addition, HTTP Single Sign-On (SSO) extension allows seamless user login and registration experience. LMS also has multiple-language support for changing the learning portal interface language to Arabic, Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Hebrew, Hindi, Italiano, Portuguese, Srpski, and Russian with a single click of a button.  Testing Platform in LMS is designed to create and deliver tests for skills assessment, certification, pre-hire testing, employee evaluation, recruitment, and online training. A soup-to-nuts solution for students and instructors, BrainCert offer tools to deliver interactive and blended courses online using the Courses Platform. With BrainCert's powerful course creation tools, you can easily create, manage and publish the course in just a few clicks.  BrainCert allows you to upload, embed, and manage contents from your local computer, SlideShare, Dropbox, Scribd, YouTube, Vimeo, and other supported sources - all in once place.  Uploading and processing popular file formats such as DOC, PPT, PDF, ODT, TXT, MP4, MP3, and SCORM on BrainCert is ridiculously simple, even if you hate technology. Instructors can upload documents from virtually any source and rely on BrainCert to convert those files into courseware. BrainCert integrates with PayPal and Stripe to sell your tests, courses, and live classes for faster revenue. Other features include discount coupons, award certificates, marketing emails, your own SMTP mail server, drag-and-drop course designer, assignments, and advanced tracking & reporting dashboard. BrainCert offers a built-in collaboration layer that is imperative for seamless synchronous and asynchronous collaboration capabilities between presenter (teacher) and attendees (students). LMS comes integrated with our world's first WebRTC powered HTML5 Virtual Classroom in 50 languages for plugin-free Ultra HD audio and video conferencing along with multiple interactive whiteboards, screen sharing for group collaboration, chat, HTML5 based server-side session recording, share & annotate over documents,  LaTex equation editor support, Wolfram|Alpha integration, and a lot more.

Description: Brismo is a provider of lending performance data.
Full Description: Brismo brings efficiency to the market in loans, enabling loan originators to create credible performance metrics, and investors to deploy capital more productively and cost effectively. They have the broadest market coverage, working with originators of loans - from SME and consumer, to real estate and receivables - and providing market leading performance metrics to a range of investor clients. Since launching in the UK in 2014 their methodology has gained traction globally. They now cover over 65% of UK and European marketplace lending, over 50% of US marketplace lending, and are extending coverage to additional geographies, origination models, and loan types. Description: BRI.Tech is breaking new ground in orthopaedic and trauma surgery by making a second surgical intervention unnecessary.
Full Description: BRI.Tech is breaking new ground in orthopedic and trauma surgery by making a second surgical intervention unnecessary with biodegradable magnesium. The main idea behind BRI.Tech is all about the treatment of broken bones in children. In dealing with fractures, the use of a stabilizing implant is often unavoidable – and then, after a period of approximately six weeks, when bone healing is in a final state, a second operation is necessary to remove the implant from the growing skeleton. This, obviously, always constitutes a risk and might require another unpleasant hospital stay. Thus, developing a stable implant that dissolves naturally as soon as the bone is able to take over the load again is a major step towards avoiding pain and discomfort. BRI.Tech’s intention is to avoid surgical interventions for implant removal, which helps to reduce costs for the European healthcare system. BRI.Screw is the result of eight years of preclinical research, combined with state-of-the-art materials. BRI.Screw is there to stabilize a fractured bone as long as it is needed in order to support it. Unlike conventional implants, its material dissolves naturally and is excreted by the body as soon as the bone is fully functional again. BRI.Tech was founded in 2016 and is a start-up company located in Graz, Austria.

Description: BITH is an acquisition platform designed to quickly capture a share of the rapidly expanding Health IT market.
Full Description: BrownIT Holdings (BITH) is an acquisition platform designed to quickly capture a share of the $40B annual Health IT market.  Problem: The aging population 75 million Baby Boomers will present major challenges for healthcare consumers, providers, insurers, and regulators for decades to come. In response to the looming crisis, industry analysts advocate an unprecedented surge of investment in Healthcare IT to (a) maintain individual access to quality healthcare, (b) contain costs, and (c) support large public initiatives such as the Affordable Care Act,, modernization of the Veterans Administration, and responses to public epidemics and health crises. BITH Solution:  We will rapidly acquire and integrate small and mid-size Health IT companies from owners seeking an exit to (a) develop next generation Health IT products and services, (b) offer acquired products to meet customer needs, (c) maximize operational efficiencies and profits, and (d) establish a prominent market presence and brand.  In addition to government contractors we will target companies with solutions in electronic health records, mobile apps, cyber security, and fraud  prevention tools and analytics. BITH’s first acquisition is already generating revenue from the Social Security Administration and the Centers for Medicaid and Medicare. BITH has prominent leadership with expertise in government HealthIT programs, M&A, cyber security, and finance. Competitive Advantage:  BITH has extensive experience in government Health IT and the community of contractors that serve this market.  We can offer small business owners continued participation in their company and other BITH acquisitions, creative packages and upsides, and incentives for senior management and “rising stars.”  Our team of directors, advisers, and officers include industry executives, former government officials, auditors, government sales specialists, business owners, M&A specialist, cyber security, finance, and corporate legal.

Description: Brand Finance is a brand valuation and strategy consultancy that defines brand as the trademark and associated IP.
Full Description: Brand Finance is a brand valuation and strategy consultancy that defines brand as the trademark and associated IP including the word mark and trademark iconography. It calculates brand value using the Royalty Relief methodology which determines the value a company would be willing to pay to license its brand as if it did not own it. This approach involves estimating the future revenue attributable to a brand and calculating a royalty rate that would be charged for the use of the brand. It advises branded organizations on how to maximize their value through the effective management of their brands and intangible assets. Brand Finance's services support a variety of business needs, including technical valuations for accounting, tax, and legal purposes; valuations in support of commercial transactions involving different forms of intellectual property; and valuations as part of a wider mandate to deliver value-based marketing strategy and tracking, thereby bridging the gap between marketing and finance. Its clients include international brand owners, tax authorities, Intellectual Property lawyers, marketers, and investment banks. The company’s work is frequently peer-reviewed by the big four audit practices and its reports have also been accepted by various regulatory bodies, including the U.K. Takeover Panel. Founded in 1996, Brand Finance is headquartered in London and has a network of international offices worldwide.

Business Description: Brands of Puerto Rico is an e-commerce platform for Puerto Rican brands. It offers an additional distribution channel for local brands with the purpose of promoting the export of their brands and products.  		 Company Background: Brands of Puerto Rico was founded in February 2014 as a response to the economic crisis and flight of human and financial capital in Puerto Rico. After experiencing the difficulties that local entrepreneurs have and the lack of digital tools and know how among many of them its founder went out to validate these necessities and found that many entrepreneurs were seeking an affordable solution to this problem. The founders saw a great opportunity to offer these digital solutions and founded the company to address these problems. ____________________________________________________ Products/Services: Brands of Puerto Rico unlike any other alternative out there offers consumers the opportunity to find a variety of Puerto Rican Brands in one e-commerce. It also offers local brands access to digital tools as; an e-commerce platform, digital advertising, SEO, SEM, paid search, public relations and traditional Marketing efforts. As part of their compromise with the local entrepreneur Brands of Puerto Rico is offering free of charge content creation for the brands products, it includes a photo shoot of all the products that will be on the e-commerce and a promotional video of the brand. Technologies: E-commerce platform, mobile web-app and digital advertising. Markets:  The target market is the online e-commerce consumer. One of the market segments is the local consumer who wants to support local brands. The other segment of the market is the 4.5 million of Puerto Ricans who live outside the island, and are strongly attached to Puerto Rico by nostalgia and by the desire of a better Puerto Rico. In 2013, the annual online e-commerce sales in the United States were 260 Billion dollars. For 2017, it is projected that the US will have approximately 500 billion dollars on online sales. The revenue model is based on a 10% transaction fee for sales made thru the e-commerce platform. We are exploring additional revenue streams through social gifting and gift cards. Distribution Channels: The distribution channels that will be used are online advertising, content marketing, search engine optimization, search engine marketing, paid search and retargeting.  Competition: There is not a direct competition locally or internationally. Nevertheles, locally there are the following e-commerce platforms; merodea.me, Gustazos, Groupon, Oferta del Dia, Groopanda. There are some physical stores that do sell Puerto Rican brands but not online.

Description: Breivoll Inspection Technologies (BIT) is an internationally respected company applying innovative technologies.

They enable utilities in the water industry to assess status of their infrastructure and adopt a proactive pipeline management approach based on advanced technologies assessing remaining life time of metallic in-ground pipes.  BIT is a leading international supplier of pipeline inspection services, using cutting-edge Acoustic Resonance Technology (ART) in order to perform in-line pipe inspections for metallic water and district heating pipes.   Through this unique technology, the Company is able to provide constant and highly accurate measurements from inside the pipe of both internal AND external corrosion, pipeline thickness and leak detection, using an in-line PipeScanner weighing only 30 kgs. The PipeScanner also has two cameras, mainly for identifying obstacles and foreign objects in pipes.

Description: Bric helps professional service companies accurately plan thier team’s calendar.
Full Description: Bric helps you accurately plan your team’s calendar, so you can confidently get back to doing the work you love. Enter Bric. Bric was born out of a passion for analytics paired with a desire to build the confidence of agency owners. You need to know what the future holds. You need an accurate prediction of what’s around the corner. And you need to be able to make decisions before the chaos. Bric helps you accurately plan your team’s calendar, so you can confidently get back to doing the work you love. They know what it is like to run a creative agency. Bric was built from their experiences running design firms, marketing agencies, software dev shops, and predictive analytics consultancies. They started Bric because they were tired of spending all day in traffic meetings, balancing spreadsheets, and updating whiteboards. Even with all of this work, they still didn’t have the information they needed to run their businesses. They started their creative agencies because they enjoyed the work they did. People hired us because they were good at the work they loved. However, as their agencies grew they spent less time creating and more time managing time. Until, that was all they did. They knew there had to be a better way. They created Bric so They could get back to the work they love. Two of their co-founders did just that, and they are making sure that Bric can help others!

Description: Brennan Center for Justice is a non-partisan public policy and law institute that focuses on fundamental issues of democracy and justice.

The Center’s work ranges from voting rights to campaign finance reform, from ending mass incarceration to preserving constitutional protection in the fight against terrorism. Part think-tank, part advocacy group, part cutting-edge communications hub, Brennan Center starts with rigorous research. It crafts innovative policies and fights for them in congress and the states, the courts, and in the court of public opinion. Brennan Center was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New York, N.Y.

Description: Briefing.com provides independent, live market analysis of the U.S. and international equity markets.
Full Description: Briefing.com provides independent, live market analysis of the U.S. and international equity markets. It’s our passion, and has been since Dick Green, one of the most-recognized authorities in economic and financial market analysis, founded the Chicago-based company in 1993. Briefing.com was the first company to use the power of the Internet to provide live market coverage, commentary and analysis. And as the Internet has grown, so has Briefing.com. Briefing.com content serves millions of readers in 86 countries through our partnerships with virtually every leading online financial site and brokerage firm. rely on Briefing.com’s timely and unbiased market analysis to make intelligent and profitable investment decisions. We maintain an objective and unbiased approach to our analysis because we do not take any market positions and don’t make any money through financial market transactions. Our extensive network of buy-side and sell-side contacts helps us make sure our clients get the real story; often hours before analysts publish their official notes or the mainstream media picks it up. To ensure objectivity, all employees are required to sign the Briefing.com trading policy. Briefing.com remains committed to providing our readers with the timely, useful commentary and analysis they’ve come to expect. The market moves fast, and Briefing.com’s live analysis is a critical tool investors need to keep pace.

Description: Distributed Search and OverWeb protocols for Decentralizing Knowledge #blockchain #search

Description: Brighton5 is a reaction to the growing problems young people are facing .
Full Description: Brighton5 is a reaction to the growing problems young people are facing – there is a mental health crisis that is showing no sign of going away. It is a crisis that is particularly affecting girls – one in four has depression before they are 14.Brighton5 is bringing local teenagers together to create and produce video content that will be distributed through schools and colleges. Teens will share their stories in a positive, creative and safe environment to gain an understanding of issues that affect their mental health such as device addiction, self harm and negative body image. They will learn skills in production, animation and music. They will build relationships and work with expert adult mentors.

Description: BRAC tackles the causes of poverty, hunger and hopelessness at the root, and plants trees of hope.
Full Description: BRAC is a development success story, spreading solutions born in Bangladesh around the world – a global leader in creating opportunity for the world’s poor. What started out as a limited relief operation in 1972 in a remote village of Bangladesh has turned into the largest development organisation in the world. Organising the poor using communities’ own human and material resources, BRAC (formerly Bangladesh Rural Advancement Committee) catalyses lasting change, creating an ecosystem in which the poor have the chance to seize control of their own lives. They do this with a holistic development approach geared toward inclusion, using tools like microfinance, education, healthcare, legal services, community empowerment, social enterprises and BRAC University. Their work now touches the lives of an estimated 135 million people, with staff and BRAC-trained entrepreneurs numbering in the hundreds of thousands, a global movement bringing change to 11 countries in Asia, Africa and the Caribbean.

Description: The Breakthrough Initiatives were founded in 2015 by Yuri and Julia Milner to seek scientific evidence of life in the Universe.
Full Description: So wondered the great physicist Enrico Fermi. The Universe is vast and ancient. Life, he reasoned, has had plenty of time to get started – and get smart. But we see no evidence of anything alive or intelligent in space. In the last five years, we have discovered that planets in the habitable zone of stars are common. Based on the numbers discovered so far, there are estimated to be billions more in our galaxy alone. And there are hundreds of billions of galaxies in the visible Universe. Yet we are still in the dark about life. Are we really alone? Or are there others out there? It’s one of the biggest questions. And only science can answer it. The Breakthrough Initiatives were founded in 2015 by Yuri and Julia Milner to seek scientific evidence of life in the Universe.

Description: Certified SaaS Patient Portal software for healthcare organizations. Proven application with customers nationwide.
Full Description: Bridge is an enterprise patient portal and patient engagement solution that provides a superior user experience for healthcare organizations and their patients. It is ideal for organizations seeking to replace their existing EHR system's patient portal, connect disparate EHR environments with a single patient portal, and/or consolidate costly patient engagement tools with a single patient engagement solution. Bridge truly engages patients with automated electronic communication, and meaningful, multi-platform access to health, financial, and appointment information. With Bridge’s all-in-one patient engagement solution, healthcare organizations can improve patient-physician collaboration, care outcomes, and business profitability. In an industry where the term “patient engagement” is used to define everything from simple, piecemeal patient communication solutions to antiquated patient portals, Bridge is setting a new standard for patient engagement solutions. Offering a single, mobile-ready solution for secure SMS/email/push notifications, self-scheduling, health information access, patient-provider messaging, and bill pay. Bridge is available as a client-branded HTML-based web application as well as a mobile app, available for iOS and Android. With Bridge's fully-documented, and free API, customers can easily develop their own interfaces, add-on features and run advanced reports. Month-to-month contracting with scaled pricing based on actual patient registration ensures Bridge and its customers’ goals are aligned towards a highly engaged patient population. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Dallas, TX, Bridge is an employee-owned business with installations in over 50 outpatient groups, hospitals, and integrated delivery networks nationwide.

Full Description: Bravo-Telecom is a digital radio trunking operator in Saudi Arabia under a BOT agreement with the incumbent operator STC. Bravo-Telecom's focus is professional radio service to the corporate and governmental sector, with no consumer-centric prepaid offering because the network is in partnership with the incumbent operator STC which runs its own GSM and 3G network under the commercial name of Aljawal which primarily addresses this sector. The other two cellular operators launch a PTT service similar in function to the one offered by Bravo through its digital trunking network, but the former companies used a technology called PoC to facilitate this offering.

Description: Brain Navi develops innovative neuroscience technique that provides precision and safety.
Full Description: Brain Navi Biotechnology Co., Ltd. (Brain Navi) was founded in August 2015. Company's headquartered is in Hsinchu Biomedical Science Park Incubation Center, Taiwan. The company's founder is President Lin Shinn-Zong, Professor Harn Hong-zhi, and Dr. Chen Chieh-Hsiao; the company's managing team includes CEO, Chen Chieh Hsiao; CTO, Wang Kuan-Ju, and Administrative Manager, Chang Wei-Chen. We cooperate with the well-known Silicon Valley prototype development company Triple Ring Technologies to develop prototypes. Today, Brain tumor, Parkinson's disease, epilepsy and Neural diseases impacts the patients' life. These diseases often easily lead to patient body involuntarily trembling, headache, vomiting, visual disturbances, confusion or physical disability movement and other symptoms. Thus it will lead to significantly lower the quality of life. Therefore, during the neurosurgery, it is necessary to perform the operation carefully to avoid damage to other brain tissues or vessels. Brain Navi location system can provide the precise information and real-time image to reduce the risk of surgical complications.

Description: Brsima is an online application food ordering system. The system works in Sulaimania and Erbil City, soon in other cities of Iraq.
Full Description: Brsima is an online mobile and website food ordering system dedicated to connecting hungry diners and food lovers with local restaurants. Brsima has both web and mobile ordering platforms allowing diners to order directly from the restaurants they like, and choose from variety of foods of their choice. Right now, the system works everywhere in Sulaimania and Erbil City. however, we will soon have other branches in other major cities of Iraq. Customers can only pay by cash on delivery for now, but in the future, there may be other methods of payment as well.  How Does it Work? The Brsima smartphone/tablet application works on IOS and Android-based devices. Ordering may also be done on a PC on the Brsima.com website. Users can read the menu, order, and pay at the door. Brsima teams up with various restaurants to offer a wider range of cuisines. Brsima locations provide breakfast, lunch, brunch, and dinner menus. Some restaurants are open from 10:00 AM to 01:00 AM 7 days a week. The app detects the user's location and displays restaurants open at the time separately from those that are closed. Meals are delivered by our delivery personnels using different transportation methods such as bikes, motors, cars, etc. As of 2018 the delivery fees are 1500 - 3500 IQD, depend on the distance from the restaurant. However there are multiple restaurants that deliver for Free. Upon ordering, the customer is notified of the total price combining delivery fee and meal major city, become the nation’s greatest food ordering service, and tackle all the issues facing other startup businesses such as delivery and payment issues. price, no tips required. Customers can track the delivery status after the order is placed. Our mission?  Our mission is to serve hungry people who are fed up with the outdated ordering methods such as phone calls, and paper menus. We aim to expand across Iraq, have a branch in every major city, become the nation’s greatest food ordering service, and tackle all the issues facing other startup businesses such as delivery and payment issues.   Sulaimani/ Darwaza City B66 +964770 244 2525 Brsima Team

Description: Brainpool AI is a worldwide network of AI and Machine Learning experts. 300+ data scientists - academics and professionals
Full Description: Brainpool AI is a worldwide network of AI and Machine Learning experts. We are a pool of 300+ data scientists - academics and professionals - leading the frontiers of AI development and coming from leading AI hubs such as UCL, Oxford, Cambridge, Harvard, MIT, Stanford, NYU. Brainpool AI provides access to these experts on a project basis as well as AI consultancy services.   Brainpool’s mission is to democratise access to AI and bridge the gap between academia and the corporate world by finding applications of our data scientists’ research in business.

Categories: Fashion, Health Care, Lifestyle, Lingerie, Medical Device, Product Design
Description: Fashion Technology
Full Description: Brobe is changing the way people recover by providing quality, functional products that give patients a more comfortable recovery time, independence, and peace of mind. Our flagship product, The Brobe is a luxurious robe with a built-in attached bra designed for women throughout different stages in their life, like cancer treatment recovery and childbirth. The first functional, yet feminine garment for women, designed specifically for women with breast cancer and for nursing mothers. We are first to market, and constantly researching new opportunities to help people heal beautifully. Today, the Recovery Brobe features two pockets on either side to host post-operative fluid drains. The detachable Recovery Bra, also sold separately, features inside pockets for ice packs and/or prosthetic breast. Its Velcro front-closure makes independent dressing easier and more comfortable. The robe’s ¾” sleeves allow for easy IV access during treatment and the fabric is durable, yet luxurious for comfortable wear. It has become the FIRST bra + robe combination designed for breast cancer recovery, made to be worn before, during and after recovery. Since then we’ve expanded our line of recovery accessories with the Shower Belt by Brobe. We are constantly seeking new opportunities to help people feel comfortable while they heal. After the success of the Recovery Brobe, a new group of women – new and expectant mothers – raised their voices, asking for a functional, yet feminine nursing garment for wear in the hospital and at home. In 2013, the Mommy Brobe launched, featuring the same high-quality design in a bra + robe combination specifically for breastfeeding.  We focus on the patient's wellness, not their sickness. Our hope is that we can empower each person to regain their independence, dignity and sense of control to overcome some of life's most challenging physical curveballs.

Description: Formative assessment, lesson planning and parent communication
Full Description: BrightLoop is Evernote for teachers. We enable teacher to use qualitative student insight to personalize learning and communicate progress. BrightLoop increases teacher satisfaction by taking the stress out of personalized instruction - improving student achievement and teacher retention. By supporting teachers in personalizing instruction, offsetting reliance on standardized data and highlighting a teacher’s positive impact on students, BrightLoop strives to decrease teacher turnover and renew a sense of confidence and respect for the teaching profession.

Description: Lifestyle brand -Retail
Full Description: When founder Dylan Jacob first turned 21, he quickly discovered that warm alcohol was the worst. In early 2016, Dylan set out to find a solution for keeping his favorite alcoholic beverages at the perfect temperature. He ended up creating BrüMate, the fastest growing international drinkware brand, with over 1,000,000 customers within just 2 years of their launch. This landed him on the prestigious Forbes 30 under 30 list. We are the only company whose mission is to create the perfect drinking experience by ensuring every sip of your favorite adult beverage is just as refreshing as the first, no matter where life takes you. Whether you are having an all day picnic with your favorite bottle of wine, or enjoying a beer before the big game, we have you covered. We are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality products, innovative solutions, and a lifetime warranty to guarantee your beer, wine, and spirits are always at their freshest. The party starts with BrüMate.

Description: Brio Software is a Software company.
